content: in next chain-1 space 10 double_crochet double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 4 double_crochet double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 4 double_crochet chain 3 turn row 3 4 double_crochet double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 6 double_crochet 2dc chain 1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 12 double_crochet double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 6 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 5 double_crochet chain 3 turn row 4 5 double_crochet double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 10 double_crochet 2dc chain 1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 14 double_crochet double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 10 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 6 double_crochet chain 3 turn row 5 6 double_crochet double_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in next chain-1 space single_crochet * picot single_crochet repeat from * 12 times 13 picots made single_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 16 double_crochet double_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in next chain-1 space single_crochet * picot single_crochet repeat from * 12 times 13 picots made single_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 7 double_crochet chain 1 turn row 6 single_crochet in 1st double_crochet 7 single_crochet single_crochet in chain-1 space chain 4 single_crochet in next chain-1 space 18 single_crochet single_crochet in next chain-1 space chain 4 single_crochet in next chain-1 space 8 single_crochet slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet to join chain 3 turn top will now be worked in rnds round 1 double_crochet in each single_crochet around working 4 double_crochet into each chain-4 space work dcs over chain to cover it join with slip_stitch to top of chain-3 47 dcs counting 1st chain-3 chain 3 turn round 2 double_crochet in each st around joining as above chain 1 turn round 3 single_crochet in same st * picot single_crochet in next st repeat from * around ending with picot slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet fasten yarn neck & back opening trim attach yarn at right back neck edge chain 1 2 single_crochet in same space single_crochet evenly down right back opening and up left back opening working 2 single_crochet in left back neck edge space single_crochet in each st around neck join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet chain 1 slip_stitch in same st chain 3 skip next single_crochet on right back opening slip_stitch in next single_crochet slip_stitch in next 4 single_crochet chain 3 skip next single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet and each single_crochet until you reach the bottom of back opening fasten yarn weave in yarn ends sew 2 buttons along left back edge © 2006 beverly button http //www buttonspecialties com please do not reproduce sell or distribute this pattern by any means you may sell your finished work made from this pattern
